metadata.synopsis: One of the Crusher's really drunk friends comments on seeing Crusher being beaten by the player.

0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Breg
0.context: NodeContext: The player just beat one of the strongest goblins, and this goblin is in Awe.

1.speaker: Sharp-Eye Breg
1.context: NodeContext: The player just beat one of the strongest goblins, and this goblin is in Awe.
